title: Google\Cloud\Vision\V1\ImageAnnotationContext
name: ImageAnnotationContext
description:
If an image was produced from a file (e.g. a PDF), this message gives information about the source of that image.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.vision.v1.ImageAnnotationContext

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.uri
params.description: The URI of the file used to produce the image.

params.name: data.page_number
params.description: If the file was a PDF or TIFF, this field gives the page number within the file used to produce the image.

methods.description:
